channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Usual flytipping in Durfey Place, 28th January
item.description:
Flytipping in Durfey Place remains a constant issue. I have already raised this within complaint 49002965. It is now happening almost every day, and it continues to have a real impact on residents. Ms Sophia Opoku-Addo, Resident Services Officer for this area, never replied to any emails about the issue and the working group set up by her predecessor. This is simply unacceptable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61, Edmund Street, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large potholes in this location, 28th January
item.description:

item.title: Stop lines fading, 28th January

item.title: Car wash Littering, 28th January
item.description:
Even after politely asking them to stop Littering our side of the street whilst on break they won't stop. I wish to report this business (rosina Street car wash) for antisocial behaviour. Also there is a rat infestation in their premises. Please fine them.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Homerton High Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain collapsed 51 - 53 Mount Road Bexleyheath, 28th January
item.description:
The drain in the middle of the road has collapsed and all the concrete around it. Cars and buses are driving over it continuously and it is making a really loud noise. Please can this be looked into with a matter of urgency.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mount Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
